Audio.Locality: S Pocone on Transpantaneira, Mato Grosso
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback of unseen bird about 2m up in dense understory of gallery forest along Rio Claro.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Chloroceryle amazona,Crypturellus undulatus,Pitangus sulphuratus,Leptotila verreauxi,Donacobius atricapilla
